channel.title: Exp
channel.description: How do I change the Exp when i attack a monster? I mean each hit. So people won't level ridiculously like in testscape? Or is there a source with fair exp? Can you give me link for it, if there is?

item.description:

it’s ether porjetc 16 world 8 or cheezscape.that has low exp.

item.title: Exp
item.dc:creator: @Deller7 Deller7
item.description:
@Deller7 wrote:

But in project 16, the exp is ridiciulosly high. You level 20 Attack points in 1 hit. I’m trying to make something hard, like Runescape, real exp, No commands, Start with noobie stuff ect.

Read full topic

it’s non pk but…theres commands that give you like dragon and stuff fro reg players.

item.description:
@Deller7 wrote:

Yeah, but whitescape is Pk. I need a Non-Pk source with Good Exp per hit, and with a timer. I’m making a server, which is realistic like Runescape.

item.title: Exp
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

yes there is a good source with good exp…pimpscape…u might just want to change the range exp, cuz it is quite low and members may eventually start complaining, but i will soon be releasing a source of my own, which will be called 1337scape so be on teh look-out
